hmm.. Doesn't seem to work. I assume I';m doing something wrong here:
```using WGLMakie, JSServe, Observables
using JSServe.DOM
function handler(session, request)
    color_obs = Observable(500)
    b = JSServe.Button("click me", class=map(x-> "bg-blue-$(x)", color_obs))
    on(b) do _
        x = rand(0:900)
        @show x
        color_obs[] = x
    end
    DOM.div(JSServe.TailwindCSS, b)
end
app = JSServe.Application(handler, "0.0.0.0", 8084)```
